description.narrative: Education system managers have capacities and tools for better decentralized management of equitable and quality education services, including in humanitarian situations.

sector.narrative: Education Management Information System (EMIS) (excluding learning assessment systems)
Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
Education sector planning including coordinating role, SDG 4, etc.
System strengthening - life skills (for personal empowerment, active citizenship, etc.)

title.narrative: Niger United Nations Development Assistance Framework
Niger Programme Strategy Note Theory of Change (Education)
Niger Country Programme Document 2014-2018 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Education system managers have capacities and tools for better decentralized management of equitable and quality education services, including in humanitarian situations.

description.narrative: UNICEF, as the sector lead agency, led the policy support to accompany the elaboration of the transitional education sector plan and signature of the partnership framework, as well as improving the quality and utilisation of the education data and conducting studies to build the evidence base for the sector. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:03/01/2020

title.narrative: Number of School Management Committees using school-data
Number of communities who participate in the management of schools and early learning centers (through mention in the Community Development Plan)

System Strengthening - Innovations - Availability of strong evidence of successful and cost-effective innovations to improve access and learning for the most disadvantaged children - score (1-4), see guidance
Existence of a National Strategy for preventing and addressing Education in Emergencies
